heading: Clients
subHeading: Connect MCP Clients to the QuantConnect MCP Server
content: Model Context Protocol (MCP) clients connect to the QC MCP server so that you can interact with our API through the client's Large Language Model (LLM). The following clients are officially supported for the QC MCP Server. To view all the clients that work with MCP, see the Feature support matrix on the MCP website. Clients that operate from the terminal can edit files on your local machine and can run from the terminal in Visual Studio Code.
